concepts.MALNUTRITION_OF_MILD_DEGREE_(GOMEZ:_75%_: Malnutrition of mild degree (Gomez: 75% to Less than 90% of Standard Weight)
concepts.BODY_MASS_INDEX_21_DESC:
Body Mass Index (BMI) is a relationship between weight and height that is associated with body fat and health risk.

The equation is BMI = body weight in kilograms/height in meters squared.
concepts.MALNUTRITION_OF_MODERATE_DEGREE_(GOMEZ:_: Malnutrition of moderate degree (Gomez: 60% to Less than 75% of Standard Weight)
